channel.title: Multi hittng attacks (barrage etc) [317]
channel.description:
Does anyone have a small tutorial or link on how to create a multi hitting attack, or atleast ic barrage, i have an assumption on it but i don't want to try b.c i only started coding using turing and im not the strongest in java.
honestly i could only assume adding onto the original attack but using a lastClick method and create the radius e.g (5[squares])
llinks or personal info on this would be a great help
using delta btw.
